additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (77%), Reconstituted Juice [Apple (17%), Kiwifruit (3.0%), Watermelon (2.0%)], Natural Flavours (Contain Steviol Glycosides), Food Acids (Ascorbic Acid, Malic Acid), Stabiliser (466), Natural Colours (Lycopene, Anthocyanin).

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: Low in Sugar, No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavours or Colours

description: Golden Circle Refreshers Wild Waterfall Flavoured Water Drink 250mL
